title: Poland: Citi Handlowy's Entrepreneurship Day
summary: Warsaw - On March 22, secondary school students visited Citi Handlowy to attend a one-day internship, which was a one-of-a-kind opportunity to experience a typical work day at the bank.
tag-2: Warsaw – On March 22, secondary school students visited Citi Handlowy to attend a one-day internship, which was a one-of-a-kind opportunity to experience a typical work day at the bank.
tag-3: The Entrepreneurship Day has been organized for the past nine years by the Junior Achievement Foundation in cooperation with Citi Handlowy's Kronenberg Foundation under the auspices of the Chancellery of the President of Poland. Thanks to its increasing popularity, the day was named an annual event in Polish secondary school curricula.
tag-4: During the day, students under the tutelage of Citi experts learned about different professions, and the skills and capabilities necessary to fill those roles. Such experience helps young people make important decisions about their future educational and professional careers. The other chief objective of the program is to encourage other entrepreneurs to be involved in educating young people and in giving them useful knowledge about how to enter the labor market.
tag-5: Citi Handlowy has always been very active in the field of Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR), mainly through its Kronenberg Foundation, which this year celebrates its 15th anniversary.
tag-6: For Citi Handlowy, the Entrepreneurship Day is a great opportunity to develop strong bonds with the local communities and to present the Citi as an attractive employer. At the same time, the day creates the opportunity of meeting young, creative talents who connect their future career with banking.
tag-7: As every year, in 2012 Citi Handlowy played the top role in this initiative, hosting 265 students who could choose from 464 offered positions in its offices across Poland.
tag-8: At the end of the day, a special ceremony was held in the Presidential Palace during which the most active schools and institutions were presented awards and diplomas.
tag-9: View more about Citi as an employer at http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rbUhT08peaA.

tag-12: Citi Handlowy  Citi Handlowy is one of the major financial institutions in Poland and offers, under the Citi Handlowy brand, a broad range of state-of-the-art products in corporate, investment and consumer banking.
